'''Sarah Boeving''' is an artist at [[Mojang Studios]] working on ''[[Minecraft]]''.

== Work on ''Minecraft'' ==
Her earliest known work was on the textures for the [[wolf]] variants introduced in [[Armored Paws]].<ref>{{tweet|sarahboevingart|1778067345241493836|Oh lovely!
